data.actual_result: Submit button is present but nothing happens when you press on it
data.expected_result: Either you shouldn't be able to search for a space and then the submit button shouldn't pop up until you type actual text, or the submit button should do its job
data.short_description: When the search bar is only filled with spaces, the submit button pops up but does nothing on press
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any channel - Tap Search - Ensure the search bar is empty - Press Space on you keyboard
